alert.note: Alert for Ontario; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 6:23PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wayne and northern Ontario Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 623 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Canandaigua, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Canandaigua, Newark, Palmyra, Victor, Clifton Springs, Phelps, Bloomfield, Farmington, Manchester, Macedon, Shortsville, Port Gibson, Holcomb, Seneca Castle, Cheshire, Willow Creek Estates and West Junius. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 44 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
